gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 120, Cavaliers 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hornets defeated the Cavaliers, 120-110. Nick Smith Jr. recorded a career-high 24 points (6-11 3PT FG), along with six rebounds and three assists for the Hornets, while JT Thor added 20 points, nine rebounds and four assists in the victory. Max Strus posted his first career triple-double as he tallied 14 points, 10 rebounds and a career-high 11 assists for the Cavaliers in the losing effort. The Hornets finish the regular season at 21-61, while the Cavaliers finish 48-34.
